page.title: 05The R.A.E. Club
page.content: To get to the R.A.E. Club you have to travel up along the A6 past the row of shops and then keep going along the A6 till you get to Twinwoods Road. On the corner of Twinwoods Road there is a little blue hut and there is a car park. You can only go into the R.A.E club if you are a member or with a member, but if you sign the books you are allowed in only for that night. If you want to be a member you have to get an application form and fill it in. The club then gets you put down on the waiting list and the club then votes on whether or not they want you. Some people wait one year or two to get to be a member. In the room which has games there is a pool table, but you have to pay 2Op a go. There is also a table tennis table and there are some skittles with the cheese.
